concept.title: Welcome to Apartment B8's Kitchen!
concept.shortdesc: In this kitchen you'll find everything you need to make a wholesome breakfast. Consider this a manual for cooking in Apartment B8, and use it anytime you need to reference available appliances, ingredients, or recipes.

conbody.p: I hope you slept well, mom. Below, I have detailed the appliances and ingredients that I keep in my kitchen so you know what is available to use!
I hope you are getting settled in comfortable, armando! Below is a list of the appliances and ingredients that are available for you to use!
